titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 40% Polymer acid salt/polymer amide 60% butyl acetate.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 40% Polymer acid salt/polymer amide 60% butyl acetate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on 40% Polymer acid salt/polymer amide 60% butyl acetate.
